restaurants.name: The Gourmet Bistro
restaurants.description: A charming spot offering a diverse range of international dishes crafted to perfection.

restaurants.name: Savory Sanctuary
restaurants.description: An eclectic mix of flavors from around the world, set in a serene seaside location.

restaurants.name: Epicurean Escape
restaurants.description: A haven for food enthusiasts, featuring gourmet delicacies and an elegant atmosphere.

restaurants.name: Tastebud Tavern
restaurants.description: A cozy spot in the historic quarter, serving up classic comfort food with a modern twist.

restaurants.name: Cuisine Corner
restaurants.description: Located in the bustling Market Square, this eatery offers artisanal bites and fresh, local ingredients.
